channel.title: Indexing on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Indexing on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: The ip4r extension in Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
item.description:
Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server now supports the ip4r extension (Generally Available). ip4r provides efficient storage and indexing for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and ranges and can be installed on Flexible Server instances.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Index Advisor for Azure DocumentDB
item.description:
Public preview of Index Advisor integrated into the DocumentDB for VS Code extension. It helps you view and debug database performance and uses natural-language recommendations to suggest optimal indexing and best practices for MongoDB workloads.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: ai: Ground Your Agents Faster with Native Azure AI Search Indexing in Foundry
item.description:
Azure AI Foundry now can create a production-ready Azure AI Search vector index natively during agent grounding, enabling immediate indexing with no prior search setup and speeding agent deployment to production.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog
